entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
